text: Ñɨn anɨb ak gapman bɨnonɨm Helod, ne taun Taya binɨb okok sek, taun Saydon binɨb okok sek nɨgek, nop mɨlɨk yowak. Pen kɨli tap mɨdup delɨgɨpal, man Helod ne kodolɨgup ak. Anɨb ak Taya Saydon binɨb jɨmñɨl apɨl nop nɨgɨlak. Pen kɨli ned bɨ Blastus nop ap agnɨgelak, ne yaw agak. Bɨ anɨb ak, Helod kal nop kod yolɨgup. Agek, Helod nop am nɨŋɨd anɨb agɨlak, Chɨnop mɨlɨk ma nɨgɨnɨmɨn, kɨmɨgel jɨmñɨl yonɨgun agɨlak.
